item.title: Variants of Concern
item.description: Active VOC cases 4145 VOC Percentage 39.2% Total VOC cases 6310 Total VOC recovered 2137 Total deaths from VOC 28 VOC specimens screened 20692 Covid-19 variants of concern data current as of Sun, Apr 04, 2021 Variants of Concern Charts Alberta Health Services and the Government of Alberta Covid-19 tracker began providing active VOC cases by AHS Zone on Mar 29.
